alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:06PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. Johns, northern Putnam, Clay and south central Duval Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 506 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bostwick, or 10 miles northwest of Hastings, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Green Cove Springs, Hastings, Middleburg, Fruit Cove, World Golf Village, Fleming Island, George`s Lake, Picolata, Switzerland and Florahome. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Putnam
